name: trijam141 - gate to another world
description:
Not really too much gameplay. Progress with you character on an ever growing map and find the gate to another world ;) Control with AWSD
I struggled a bit with my setup but in the end it the result is okayish at it took about 4h ;)
I guess at some point you need to start with this 3h jams :D Let's get better next time
